channel.title: [ASP]Hit Counter Code
channel.description:
I'm guessing ASP things go here? Anyways, heres the source: [code]<% Set FS=Server.CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") Set RS=FS.OpenTextFile(Server.MapPath("counter.txt"), 1, False) fcount=RS.ReadLine RS.Close fcount=fcount+1 'This code is disabled due to the write access security on our server: 'Set RS=FS.OpenTextFile(Server.MapPath("counter.txt"), 2, False) 'RS.Write fcount 'RS.Close Set RS=Nothing Set FS=Nothing %>

This page has been visited <%=fcount%> times.

[/code] No i didn't make this. Enjoy.

item.title: [ASP]Hit Counter Code
item.dc:creator: @Chase Chase
item.description:
@Chase wrote:

I’m guessing ASP things go here? Anyways, heres the source:

[code]<%
Set FS=Server.CreateObject(“Scripting.FileSystemObject”)
Set RS=FS.OpenTextFile(Server.MapPath(“counter.txt”), 1, False)
fcount=RS.ReadLine
RS.Close

fcount=fcount+1

'This code is disabled due to the write access security on our server:
'Set RS=FS.OpenTextFile(Server.MapPath(“counter.txt”), 2, False)
'RS.Write fcount
'RS.Close

Set RS=Nothing
Set FS=Nothing

%>

This page has been visited <%=fcount%> times.

[/code] No i didn't make this. Enjoy.

Read full topic
